Question 18
The diagram above shows a current carrying wire between the poles of a magnet. In
which direction would the wire tend to move?
Options
A) into the paper
B) out of the paper
C) towargs the north pole of the magnet
D) towards the south pole of the magnet
E) towards the top of the pages
The correct answer is B.
Explanation:
Towards the south pole of the magnet
